judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The findings of the court below are fully supported by the evidence and justify the conclusion of law that the appellant, Leona Fen ell, failed to establish that she was the common-law wife of the decedent.
Decree affirmed at the appellant’s costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Fenell Estate.
Argued April 26, 1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
May 27, 1957:
T. Dean Lower, for appellant.
Robert G. Haberstroh, for appellee.
